attributes.action: Proposal for Flexible School Holiday Allowance
attributes.additional_details:
Greater flexibility for families to spend quality time together.

Reduced financial strain, as families could avoid inflated travel costs during peak seasons.

Less pressure on travel, tourism, & childcare sectors caused by peek holidays.

Improved work-life balance & mental well-being for parents & children alike.

I believe this proposal would better reflect modern family needs, enhance equality for working parents, & support a more balanced approach to education & family life.
attributes.background: Replace fixed terms with a flexible model, similar to a workplace. Schools would retain a traditional 2wks at Christmas & 1wk at Easter. Each child would be allocated an additional 10 days flexible leave a year, to be taken at any time. This flexibility would not apply during GCSE years 10 and 11.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is very similar to yours:
